question: Your club get stuck when you play your shot and you accidentally strike the ball more than once.*

choices.text: You count a shot for each time the ball hit your club
If it was done accidentally then it only counts as one stroke
It's an invalid shot. Replace the ball to where it was and try again.

explanation: It counts as one stroke only, and there is no penalty. You can't use this rule to your advantage though, intentionally hitting the ball twice will land you with penalty strokes!
